name: KNIC Concordances
short_description: KNIC concordances permit users of the treebank search software TIGERSearch (http://www.ims.uni-stuttgart.de/forschung/ressourcen/werkzeuge/tigersearch.en.html) to create a concordance-style table of their query results from an exported TIGER-XML result file.  This software was originally designed for the Syntactic Reference Corpus of Medieval French (http://www.srcmf.org).  It was developed in collaboration with the developers of the open-source TXM platform (http://textometrie.ens-lyon.fr/?lang=en).
summary: Syntactic concordances from TIGERSearch query results
